evidence.claim: Kaleida Systems mentions HIPAA compliance in their solutions.
The company utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
Integration with FHIR standards is highlighted on their healthcare solutions page.
Kaleida Systems implements HL7 standards for data interoperability.
They utilize GCP for data analytics and storage solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse services found.
